text.section: The head of each department and each independent unit shall designate, from among its staff, a forms management officer for the department or independent unit.

The forms management officer shall:
subject to the approval of the Division:
keep a current plan for the management of the forms that the unit uses; and
administer the plan; and
submit the plan, including each revision, to the Division.
